pageTitle: Public events for December 17, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
UPDATED

Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, December 17, 2015:

Vancouver

11:00 a.m. – The Prime Minister meets with Vancouver Mayor Gregor Robertson.

Vancouver City Hall
Front steps, 453 West 12th Avenue
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.
  • Media should contact the City of Vancouver at 1-604-218-5952 for accreditation

Vancouver

11:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister holds a joint media availability with Vancouver Mayor Gregor Robertson.

Vancouver City Hall, Media Room
Main floor, 453 West 12th Avenue
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.
  • Media should contact the City of Vancouver at 1-604-218-5952 for accreditation

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
